name: nesasm-js
description: A javascript port of the NESASM assembler

scripts.prepack: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:debug: mkdirp build && cd build && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make && cp-cli nesasm.js ../lib/nesasm.js
scripts.build:release: mkdirp build && cd build && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && make && cp-cli nesasm.js ../lib/nesasm.js
